DOC.criteria: Stable heterosexual relationship History erectile dysfunction least 6 month IIEF EF Domain entry score ( Visit 2 ) : > 21 point Documented metabolic syndrome accord IDF ( International Diabetes Foundation ) Subjects motivate erectile dysfunction treatment Documented , date , write informed consent Any underlying cardiovascular condition History myocardial infarction Uncontrolled atrial fibrillation Resting hypotension Postural hypotension within 6 month Visit 1 History congenital QT prolongation Bleeding disorder History prostatectomy prostate cancer Hereditary degenerative retinal disorder History loss vision NAION ( nonarteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy ) 29 Additional Exclusion Criteria
